      • testIssue51DetectJava7ConcatenationBug

        public void testIssue51DetectJava7ConcatenationBug()
                                            throws IOException
        Issue #51: https://github.com/codehaus-plexus/plexus-utils/issues/51 Purpose: test if concatenation string optimization bug is present. Target environment: Java 7 (u79 and u80 verified) running on Windows. Detection strategy: Tries to build a big XML file (~750MB size) and with many nested tags to force the JVM to trigger the concatenation string optimization bug that throws a NoSuchElementException when calling endElement() method.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
